definitions.definition: A vessel with two portions unequally exposed to heat , and with connecting pipes or passages, through which the fluid rises from the overheated portion, and descends from the relatively colder, maintaining a circulation .

main_definition: ( chemistry ) A vessel with two portions unequally exposed to heat , and with connecting pipes or passages, through which the fluid rises from the overheated portion, and descends from the relatively colder, maintaining a circulation .
